title: What can I do if my phone can't display contacts saved in the SIM card?
answer:
In the contacts list, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208143231538001.png) > **Contacts to display**, and turn on **All contacts**.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208143231630002.png)

If you just inserted the SIM card into your phone, it may take a while for the phone to load the contacts. Please wait patiently.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208143232686003.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208143233189004.jpg) 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208143231630002.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
